price: ߊ߯ߘߌ ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߣߌ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߊ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߘߌ߬؟
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
